trans-unit.source: Discards expired events, and makes WordCamps "sticky." Attendees need more advanced notice about WordCamps than they do for meetups, so camps should appear in the list sooner. If a WordCamp is coming up, the API will "stick" it in the response, even if it wouldn’t otherwise appear. When that happens, the event will be at the end of the list, and will need to be moved into a higher position, so that it doesn’t get trimmed off.
trans-unit.target: 丢弃过期的事件，并使WordCamps“具有粘性”。与聚会相比，与会者需要更高级的WordCamp通知，因此营地应尽快出现在列表中。如果出现WordCamp，则API会在响应中“粘贴”它，即使它不会出现。发生这种情况时，该事件将位于列表的末尾，并且需要将其移至更高的位置，以免被裁剪。

trans-unit.source: Encode the Unicode values to be used in the URI.
trans-unit.target: 对URI中要使用的Unicode值进行编码。

trans-unit.source: Encodes < > & " ' (less than, greater than, ampersand, double quote, single quote). Will never double encode entities.
Encodes the <, >, &, ” and ‘ (less than, greater than, ampersand, double quote and single quote) characters. Will never double encode entities.
trans-unit.target: 编码<，>，＆，”和“（小于，大于，＆，双引号和单引号）字符。永远不会对实体进行双重编码。

trans-unit.source: End date to export content to. Expected date format is 'Y-m-d'. Used only when $content is 'post', 'page' or 'attachment'. Default false (latest publish date).
trans-unit.target: 导出内容的结束日期。预期的日期格式为“ Ym-d”。仅在 $content 为“ post”，“ page”或“ attachment”时使用。默认值为false（最新发布日期）。

trans-unit.source: Endpoint mask to assign. If not specified and permalink_epmask is set, inherits from $permalink_epmask. If not specified and permalink_epmask is not set, defaults to EP_PERMALINK.
trans-unit.target: 要分配的端点掩码。如果没有指定并且permalink_epmask被设置,则从$permalink_epmask继承。如果没有指定且没有设置permalink_epmask,则默认为EP_PERMALINK。

trans-unit.source: Endpoint objects should be created and register their hooks on this action rather than another action to ensure they’re only loaded when needed.
trans-unit.target: 应该创建端点对象，并在此操作（而不是其他操作）上注册其挂钩，以确保仅在需要时加载它们。

trans-unit.source: Ends the current recovery mode session.
trans-unit.target: 结束当前的恢复模式会话。

trans-unit.source: Ends the element output, if needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要,结束元素输出。

trans-unit.source: Ends the list of after the elements are added.
trans-unit.target: 结束元素添加后的列表。

trans-unit.source: Ends the list of items after the elements are added.
trans-unit.target: 在添加元素后结束项目列表。

trans-unit.source: Enqueue PNG fallback CSS for embed iframe for legacy versions of IE.
trans-unit.target: 为旧版IE的嵌入iframe启用PNG后备CSS。

trans-unit.source: Enqueue a CSS stylesheet.
trans-unit.target: 启用一个CSS样式表。

trans-unit.source: Enqueue a script.
trans-unit.target: 启用一个脚本。

trans-unit.source: Enqueue all editor scripts.
trans-unit.target: 启用所有编辑脚本。

trans-unit.source: Enqueue assets needed by the code editor for the given settings.
trans-unit.target: 为给定的设置启用代码编辑器所需的资产。

trans-unit.source: Enqueue control related scripts/styles.
trans-unit.target: Enqueue控件相关脚本/样式。

trans-unit.source: Enqueue embed iframe default CSS and JS & fire do_action(‘enqueue_embed_scripts’)
trans-unit.target: 排队嵌入iframe默认CSS和JS并执行do_action（'enqueue_embed_scripts'）

trans-unit.source: Enqueue preview scripts.
trans-unit.target: 启用预览脚本。

trans-unit.source: Enqueue scripts and styles for Customizer pane.
trans-unit.target: 为自定义器窗格加入脚本和样式。

trans-unit.source: Enqueue scripts and styles for the login page.
trans-unit.target: 启用登录页面的脚本和样式。

trans-unit.source: Enqueue scripts for all admin pages.
trans-unit.target: 启用所有管理页面的脚本。

trans-unit.source: Enqueue scripts for customize controls.
trans-unit.target: 启用脚本的自定义控件。

trans-unit.source: Enqueue scripts for the Customizer preview.
trans-unit.target: 启用自定义器预览的脚本。

trans-unit.source: Enqueue scripts/styles for the color picker.
trans-unit.target: 启用颜色选择器的脚本/样式。

trans-unit.source: Enqueue the tag suggestion script.
trans-unit.target: 启用标签建议脚本。

trans-unit.source: Enqueues all scripts, styles, settings, and templates necessary to use all media JS APIs.
trans-unit.target: 启用使用所有媒体JS APIs所需的所有脚本、样式、设置和模板。

trans-unit.source: Enqueues or directly prints a stylesheet link to the specified CSS file.
trans-unit.target: 查询或直接打印样式表链接到指定的CSS文件。

trans-unit.source: Enqueues preview scripts.
trans-unit.target: 排列预览脚本。

trans-unit.source: Enqueues registered block scripts and styles, depending on current rendered context (only enqueuing editor scripts while in context of the editor).
trans-unit.target: 根据当前渲染的上下文,排队注册块脚本和样式(只在编辑器的上下文中排队编辑器脚本)。

trans-unit.source: Enqueues scripts and styles for Customizer panel and export data to JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 为自定义器面板保留脚本和样式,并将数据导出为JavaScript。

trans-unit.source: Enqueues scripts for the Customizer preview.
trans-unit.target: 为自定义器预览保留脚本。

trans-unit.source: Enqueues the assets required for the block directory within the block editor.
Enqueues the default ThickBox js and css.
trans-unit.target: 启用默认的ThickBox js和css。

trans-unit.source: Enqueues the site health scripts.
trans-unit.target: 排列网站健康脚本。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the attachments are valid and that they have slugs and file name/path.
trans-unit.target: 确保附件是有效的,它们有塞子和文件名/路径。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the current site’s domain is listed in the allowed redirect host list.
trans-unit.target: 确保在允许的重定向主机列表中列出了当前站点的域。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the value is fully populated with the necessary properties.
trans-unit.target: 确保该值完全填充了必要的属性。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the welcome message is not empty. Currently unused.
trans-unit.target: 确保欢迎词不是空的。目前未使用。

trans-unit.source: Ensure the ‘meta_query’ argument passed to the class constructor is well-formed.
trans-unit.target: 确保传递给类构造函数的'meta_query'参数格式正确。

trans-unit.source: Ensure the ‘tax_query’ argument passed to the class constructor is well-formed.
trans-unit.target: 确保传递给类构造函数的'tax_query'参数格式正确。

trans-unit.source: Ensure there are a balanced number of paired characters.
trans-unit.target: 确保搭配的人物数量均衡。

trans-unit.source: Ensure there are an even number of paired characters.
trans-unit.target: 确保有偶数的配对字符。

trans-unit.source: Ensures a REST response is a response object (for consistency).
trans-unit.target: 确保REST响应是一个响应对象(为了保持一致性)。

trans-unit.source: Ensures all widgets get loaded into the Customizer.
trans-unit.target: 确保所有的widget都被加载到自定义器中。

trans-unit.source: Ensures consistent descriptions between endpoints, and populates enum from schema.
trans-unit.target: 确保端点之间描述一致,并从模式中填充枚举。

trans-unit.source: Ensures intent by verifying that a user was referred from another admin page with the correct security nonce.
Ensures request arguments are a request object (for consistency).
trans-unit.target: 确保请求参数是一个请求对象(为了保持一致性)。

trans-unit.source: Ensures sidebar widget arrays only ever contain widget IDS.
trans-unit.target: 确保侧栏小部件数组只包含小部件IDS。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that any hex color is properly hashed.
trans-unit.target: 确保任何十六进制颜色都能被正确地哈希。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that each query-level clause has a ‘relation’ key, and that each first-order clause contains all the necessary keys from $defaults.
trans-unit.target: 确保每个查询级子句都有一个“关系”键，并且每个一阶子句都包含 $defaults 中的所有必需键。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that header names are always treated the same regardless of source. Header names are always case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 确保无论来源如何,头名的处理总是一样的。标题总是不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that shortcodes are not wrapped in <p>...</p>.
trans-unit.target: 确保未将短代码包装在 <p>...</p> 中。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the contents of a <pre>...</pre> HTML block are not converted into paragraphs or line breaks.
Ensures that the contents of a <pre>...</pre> HTML block are not converted into paragraphs or line-breaks.
trans-unit.target: 确保 <pre>...</pre> HTML块的内容不会转换为段落或换行符。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the provided URL is supported.
trans-unit.target: 确保支持提供的URL。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the selected video is less than 8MB and provides an error message.
trans-unit.target: 确保所选视频小于8MB,并提供错误信息。
